verses.verse: Now again<WH3254> the anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> burned<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and it incited<WH5496> David<WH1732> against them to say,<WH559> "Go,<WH1980> number<WH4487> Israel<WH3478> and Judah.<WH3063>"

Nevertheless, the king<WH4428>'s word<WH1697> prevailed<WH2388> against<WH413> Joab<WH3097> and against<WH5921> the commanders<WH8269> of the army.<WH2428> So Joab<WH3097> and the commanders<WH8269> of the army<WH2428> went<WH3318> out from the presence<WH6440> of the king, to register<WH6485> the people<WH5971> of Israel.<WH3478>

Then they came<WH935> to Gilead<WH1568> and to the land<WH776> of Tahtim-hodshi, and they came<WH935> to Dan-jaan and around<WH5439> to Sidon,<WH6721>

and came<WH935> to the fortress<WH4013> of Tyre<WH6865> and to all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the Hivites<WH2340> and of the Canaanites,<WH3669> and they went<WH3318> out to the south<WH5045> of Judah,<WH3063> [to] Beersheba.<WH884>

So when they had gone<WH7751> about<WH7751> through the whole<WH3605> land,<WH776> they came<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389> at the end<WH7097> of nine<WH8672> months<WH2320> and twenty<WH6242> days.<WH3117>

And Joab<WH3097> gave<WH5414> the number<WH4557> of the registration<WH4662> of the people<WH5971> to the king;<WH4428> and there were in Israel<WH3478> eight<WH8083> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> valiant<WH2428> men<WH376> who drew<WH8025> the sword,<WH2719> and the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> were five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> men.<WH376>

Now David<WH1732>'s heart<WH3820> troubled<WH5221> him after<WH310> <WH3651> he had numbered<WH5608> the people.<WH5971> So David said<WH559> to the Lord,<WH3068> "I have sinned<WH2398> greatly<WH3966> in what<WH834> I have done.<WH6213> But now,<WH6258> O Lord,<WH3068> please<WH4994> take<WH5674> away<WH5674> the iniquity<WH5771> of Thy servant,<WH5650> for I have acted<WH5528> very<WH3966> foolishly.<WH5528>"
When David<WH1732> arose<WH6965> in the morning,<WH1242> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to the prophet<WH5030> Gad,<WH1410> David's seer,<WH2374> saying,<WH559>

"Go<WH1980> and speak<WH1696> to David,<WH1732> 'Thus<WH3541> the Lord<WH3068> says,<WH559> "I am offering<WH5190> you three<WH7969> things;<WH7969> choose<WH977> for yourself one<WH259> of them, which I may do<WH6213> to you. "'"

So Gad<WH1410> came<WH935> to David<WH1732> and told<WH5046> him, and said<WH559> to him, "Shall seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> of famine<WH7458> come<WH935> to you in your land<WH776>? Or<WH518> will you flee<WH5127> three<WH7969> months<WH2320> before<WH6440> your foes<WH6862> while they pursue<WH7291> you? Or shall there be three<WH7969> days' pestilence<WH1698> in your land<WH776>? Then David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Gad,<WH1410> "I am in great<WH3966> distress.<WH9504> Let us now<WH4994> fall<WH5307> into the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> for His mercies<WH7356> are great,<WH7227> but do not let me fall<WH5307> into the hand<WH3027> of man.<WH120>"

When the angel<WH4397> stretched<WH7971> out his hand<WH3027> toward Jerusalem<WH3389> to destroy<WH7843> it, the Lord<WH3068> relented<WH5162> from the calamity,<WH9567> and said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> who destroyed<WH7843> the people,<WH5971> "It is enough!<WH7227> Now<WH6258> relax<WH7503> your hand!<WH3027>" And the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> was by the threshing<WH1637> floor<WH1637> of Araunah<WH728> the Jebusite.<WH2983>

Then David<WH1732> spoke<WH559> to the Lord<WH3068> when he saw<WH7200> the angel<WH4397> who was striking<WH5221> down<WH5221> the people,<WH5971> and said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2009> it is I who have sinned,<WH2398> and it is I who have done<WH5753> wrong;<WH5753> but these<WH428> sheep,<WH6629> what<WH4100> have they done<WH6213>? Please<WH4994> let Thy hand<WH3027> be against me and against my father's house.<WH1004>"

So Gad<WH1410> came<WH935> to David<WH1732> that day<WH3117> and said<WH559> to him, "Go<WH5927> up, erect<WH6965> an altar<WH4196> to the Lord<WH3068> on the threshing<WH1637> floor<WH1637> of Araunah<WH728> the Jebusite.<WH2983>"
And David<WH1732> went<WH5927> up according to the word<WH1697> of Gad,<WH1410> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded.<WH6680>

And Araunah<WH728> looked<WH8259> down<WH8259> and saw<WH7200> the king<WH4428> and his servants<WH5650> crossing<WH5674> over<WH5674> toward<WH5921> him; and Araunah<WH728> went<WH3318> out and bowed<WH7812> his face<WH639> to the ground<WH776> before the king.<WH4428>

Then Araunah<WH728> said,<WH559> "Why<WH4069> has my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> come<WH935> to his servant<WH5650>?" And David<WH1732> said,<WH559> "To buy<WH7069> the threshing<WH1637> floor<WH1637> from you, in order to build<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> to the Lord,<WH3068> that the plague<WH4046> may be held<WH6113> back<WH6113> from the people.<WH5971>"

And Araunah<WH728> said<WH559> to David,<WH1732> "Let my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> take<WH3947> and offer<WH5927> up what<WH2896> is good<WH2896> in his sight.<WH5869> Look,<WH7200> the oxen<WH1241> for the burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> the threshing<WH4173> sledges<WH4173> and the yokes<WH3627> of the oxen<WH1241> for the wood.<WH6086>
"Everything,<WH3605> O king,<WH4428> Araunah<WH728> gives<WH5414> to the king.<WH4428>" And Araunah<WH728> said<WH559> to the king,<WH4428> "May the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> accept<WH7521> you."

However, the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to Araunah,<WH728> "No,<WH3808> but I will surely<WH7069> buy<WH7069> [it] from you for a price,<WH4242> for I will not offer<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings<WH5930> to the Lord<WH3068> my God<WH430> which<WH2600> cost<WH2600> me nothing.<WH2600>" So David<WH1732> bought<WH7069> the threshing<WH1637> floor<WH1637> and the oxen<WH1241> for fifty<WH2572> shekels<WH8255> of silver.<WH3701>

And David<WH1732> built<WH1129> there<WH8033> an altar<WH4196> to the Lord,<WH3068> and offered<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings<WH5930> and peace<WH8002> offerings.<WH8002> Thus the Lord<WH3068> was moved<WH6279> by entreaty<WH6279> for the land,<WH776> and the plague<WH4046> was held<WH6113> back<WH6113> from Israel.<WH3478>
